attributes.description:
If you are looking for a trusted, reliable, multiple award-winning dealer to purchase your preowned vehicle from, then look no further. We offer certified used vehicles that you can trust and rely on at affordable prices with the best service. Let us structure a deal for you today. We offer in-house finance and pay top prices on all trade-ins. Nationwide delivery available upon request. No pre-fitted accessories are included in the price.
Pricing does not include on the road and service and delivery fees and is subject to in-house finance.

attributes.title: 2022 Volkswagen Taigo 1.0 TSI Life Auto

attributes.description:
The S-Presso offers a budget-friendly combination of driving performance and convenience. With its peppy engine, innovative car features and a comprehensive warranty, you can’t go wrong. 

This small car has strong character with bold lines and prominent exterior features. The S-Presso makes a bold statement with its muscular front grille, chunky front and rear bumpers, and distinct multireflector halogen head lamps . Because comfort matters, the S-Presso offers a spacious cabin and ample shoulder room.

attributes.title: 2022 Suzuki S-Presso 1.0 GL+ Auto

attributes.description:
The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 
The Swifts floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style.
